mapper.sql: id, target_stu, from_stu, news_id, praise, comment_id, reply_id, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from my_information where target_stu = #{target_stu} order by id DESC limit #{start},10
mapper.insert: insert into my_information (id, target_stu, from_stu, news_id, praise, comment_id, reply_id, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetStu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromStu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praise,jdbcType=BIT}, #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
